job_details.degree_required: Technical Degree or related work experience

jd: From: shaik, Convextech shaik@convextech.com Reply to: shaik@convextech.com Position Title: Technical Business Analyst Location: Chicago, IL (Hybrid (2-3 days per week)Expected Duration: 06+ months Contract minimum possibly longer.Visa acceptance: USC or Green card Holders only.Rate: $40/hr on C2CType of engagement CTC, CTH or FT: CTHMode of interview: MS Teams Job Summary:Must have media industry experience (entertainment media content, gaming)Responsibilities:This role involves serving as a liaison between business challenges and technology solutions.The key responsibilities include analysing business processes, identifying business needs, and proposing solutions that may involve software system development, process improvements, or organizational changes.A Technical Business Analyst is responsible for gathering and documenting requirements, conducting business and systems analysis, creating specifications for systems to meet business requirements, and overseeing the implementation of these systems.This role requires a combination of IT and business skills, as well as the ability to communicate effectively with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.Looking for an experienced BA who can write the user stories for dev and EQA team with enough details without much supervisionPrefer local to Chicago since they have work with product owners and participate in PI planning sessions etc.Qualifications :Technical Degree or related work experience.Proven experience in an analytics and systems development capacity.Proficiency with digital analytics e.g. google analytics, google ad manager.Nice to have: Familiarity with media player, entertainment domain.Proven analytical abilities.Excellent communicator with the ability to translate data into actionable insights.Knowledge of SAFe and Scrum.Experience in JIRA tool.
